Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: 1301 N. Arthur Ashe Blvd & 2700 W. Leigh St. - Richmond Brochure.pdf

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE has been retained as the exclusive advisor for the sale of 1301 N. Arthur Ashe Boulevard and 2700 W. Leigh Street, the two largest available single development sites (owner will sell either 5.88 acres or the entire 16.93 acres) in Richmond’s vibrant Scott’s Addition neighborhood. Perfectly located in Richmond’s fastest-growing neighborhood, and in the high-density TOD-1 Zone, 1301 N. Arthur Ashe Boulevard and 2700 W. Leigh Street offer a unique urban development opportunity with unprecedented density and versatility.

The Scott’s Addition neighborhood is enjoying an extraordinarily rapid transformation from its industrial history to a pedestrian-friendly, young, hip and diverse upscale residential and commercial community. The property and neighborhood are benefited by the central location fronting Arthur Ashe Boulevard and encompassing Bow Tie Cinemas’ Movieland, with immediate access to major interstates, apartments, breweries, restaurants, entertainment venues, grocery stores and high-profile corporate office users.

The Greater Richmond region continues to grow amidst the evolving environments with continued population and job growth, demographic diversification and unemployment rates adjusting back to all-time lows. The demographic shift is driven by the millennial generation moving back into urban neighborhoods such as Scott’s Addition. Richmond has been recognized as a leading destination for the younger workforce and companies seeking talent. Richmond has accordingly experienced over 4% annual residential rent growth, placing it 11th in the nation and a most recent increase of 2% during COVID-19. Scott’s Addition is Richmond’s number one choice for a growing workforce and its employers to call home.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Up to 16.93 Acre Development Opportunity Located in Scott's Addition

The neighborhood is booming with apartments, breweries, restaurants, numerous entertainment venues, grocery stores and high-profile corporate office users. The subject property provides an excellent opportunity for a developer looking to take advantage of one of the last large development sites in a rapidly growing neighborhood.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Collectively, the parcels contain three buildings totaling approximately 43,906 SF, a standalone 2,965 SF restaurant (Longoven) with a long-term lease, a ± 28,110 SF multi-tenant office building with termination lease rights by the Seller, and surface parking lots. The entire site is zoned TOD-1, which allows for high-density, mixed-use developments. The offering is ideally located with multiple access points to the surrounding neighborhoods, interstates, and public transportation.

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: Prime West End Industrial Land Opportunity - 11.61 Acres For Sale

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
•	RARE Development site in the MSA’s most centrally located area
•	Convenient to I-95, I-64 & I-195
•	Zoned M-2
•	Substantial Engineering Data available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
LOCATION:
Strategically located in Henrico County with I-64 to the North, Broad Street to the South, Westwood Avenue 
to the East and Staples Mill Road to the West, Dabney industrial area is at the Center of Richmond Metro Area. Immediate access to Interstates 64, 95 and 195 makes Dabney Center the area  
of choice.
Dabney industrial area consists of approximately 4,500,000 square feet of office/service/warehouse/retail space in 150 buildings with a 5-year average vacancy rate of 4.6%.
Located in the Henrico County Westwood Small Area Study. (https://henrico.us/projects/westwood-small-area-study/)

INGRESS AND EGRESS:
Dabney industrial area enjoys signal-assisted access 
on the East from Westwood Avenue, on the South from Broad Street and on the West from Staples Mill Road.

HIGHWAY ACCESS:
Due to its central location, the Dabney industrial area offers immediate access to the Downtown Expressway (I-195) and I-64, with convenient connecting access  
to I-95 and the Powhite Parkway (Route 76).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:

•	Owner will subdivide

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located at signalized intersection with easy access to Chippenham Parkway
Located directly across from HCA’s Johnston-Willis Hospital
Over 1,500 existing multifamily units located within 1/2 mile

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
7100 Jahnke Road consists of approximately .47 acres of land at a corner/signalized intersection. The property allows for easy access to both north and south of the James River via Chippenham Parkway, as well as easy access to the City of Richmond via Jahnke Road/Midlothian Turnpike. 7100 Jahnke Road is located within a robust neighborhood system of townhomes and single-family homes with average sales prices in the mid-$200,000’s. Over 1,500 apartments are located approximately 1/4 mile east, plus an additional 1,000 planned units nearby in Boulders Office Park.

The site is one of the few last developable parcels along Jahnke Road with easy access to Johnston-Willis Hospital and Chippenham Parkway, creating a great investment opportunity to associated retail users. Medical office leasing remains extremely strong with little vacancy, and very fast lease-ups along Jahnke and Hioaks Roads.
